snippet.title: The Banner Saga: Factions launch trailer
snippet.description:
The Banner Saga: Factions is now available for free on Steam, for PC and Mac. Factions is the free multiplayer standalone of the full Saga, coming later this year. Head over to Steam and try it out!

www.thebannersaga.com
